original_text: And when the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead heard of that which the Philistines had done to Saul;
korean_text: 길르앗 야베스 주민들이 블레셋 사람들이 사울에게 행한 일을 듣고

sentences.original_text: And when the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead heard
of that which the Philistines had done to Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 사울에게 한 그 일을
